MATCH (n:pfr_team_season_games), (m:pfr_team_season_games) WHERE n.year=m.year AND n.week=m.week AND n.team=m.opponent AND n.opponent=m.team AND (n.home_away='' OR n.home_away='N') MERGE(:games{ label:n.year+'_'+n.week+'_'+n.tag+'_'+m.tag, date: n.date,week: n.week,day: n.day,year: n.year,ot: n.ot,url: n.url,home_tag: n.tag,away_tag: m.tag,home_team: n.team,away_team: m.team,home_record: n.record,away_record: m.record,home_result: n.wlt,away_result: m.wlt,home_stadium: n.stadium,away_stadium: m.stadium,home_owner: n.owner,away_owner: m.owner,home_gm: n.gm,away_gm: m.gm,home_hc: n.hc,away_hc: m.hc,home_oc: n.oc,away_oc: m.oc,home_dc: n.dc,away_dc: m.dc,home_off: n.off,away_off: m.off,home_def: n.def,away_def: m.def,home_score: n.score,away_score: m.score,home_yds: n.tot_yds,away_yds: m.tot_yds,home_rush_yds: n.rush_yds,away_rush_yds: m.rush_yds,home_pass_yds: n.pass_yds,away_pass_yds: m.pass_yds,home_first_downs: n.first_downs,away_first_downs: m.first_downs,home_to: n.to,away_to: m.to,home_exp_off_pts: n.exp_off_pts,away_exp_off_pts: m.exp_off_pts,home_exp_def_pts: n.exp_def_pts,away_exp_def_pts: m.exp_def_pts,home_spt_pts: n.exp_spt_pts,away_spt_pts: m.exp_spt_pts})
MATCH (a:nfl_games) WHERE a.week='SuperBowl' AND a.home_result='L' DELETE a
